message: Starting review - retrieving phase handover and agent findings
Analyzing 32 findings against phase deliverables - verifying bugs, migrations, and race conditions
Code verification complete - preparing verdict submission with verified bugs

Review completed and verdict submitted: APPROVED. Verified all 3 phase deliverables (bugs in real_mcp_server.py, SQLite migration gaps, race condition analysis) with 32 issues found across 4 agents. All success criteria exceeded (32 issues vs 3 required, all with file:line references and severity ratings). Phase advanced to Fix Implementation.
